full_summary:
# Remote Operated Vehicle (ROV) Tender Notice

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites contractors to submit a bid for the supply, delivery, and installation of one Inspection Class Remote Operated Vehicle (ROV). This project aims to enhance the RCMP's capabilities in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

## Key Dates

* Publication Date: December 21, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2024 at 1:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 29, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

## Description of Goods and Services

The RCMP requires a contractor to provide a single Inspection Class Remote Operated Vehicle (ROV) for use in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The contract includes the supply, delivery, and installation of the ROV.

## Tender Requirements

* Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
* Bids must meet the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation and satisfy all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.
* The contract will be awarded to the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price.

## Important Information

* The RCMP adheres to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for Indigenous businesses to compete for federal government contracts.

## Contact Information

For further information or to submit a bid, please contact:

* Sandra Bremner, Procurement Officer
* Email: [sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (902) 717-5395

Note: The bid solicitation and related documents are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
